parameters.name: AccessGroupName
parameters.description:
The name of the permission group.

Limits:

*   The name must be 3 to 64 characters in length.
*   The name must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: FileSystemType
parameters.description:
The type of the file system.

Valid values:

*   standard (default): General-purpose NAS file system
*   extreme: Extreme NAS file system
*   cpfs: Cloud Parallel File Storage (CPFS) file system

> CPFS file systems are available only on the China site (aliyun.com).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: UseUTCDateTime
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to display the creation time of the permission group in UTC.

Valid values:

*   true (default): The time is displayed in UTC.
*   false: The time is not displayed in UTC.
